Text.Page:
You look like you could use a nice vacation on the beach, . So I have just the assignment for you.

At Cutthroat Harbor is a sailor named Dirken. He's instigating trouble between Kaia's Sword and the pirates that call that harbor home.

Yes, they're real pirates, although most of them are stuck on land because a struggle with some nagas left their ships at the bottom of the ocean.

We can't have a strategically important harbor fall into chaos, for obvious reasons. So keep the peace and keep a low profileâ€”the Justicars are lurking around, too.
Dirken is a busy entrepreneur. He doesn't have time for the "Whores of Kaia" or whatever you people call yourself.

Whoa, . A little touchy, eh? Kaia's Sword...that's what I meant to say. Slip of the tongue.

Anyway, if you're military, let me guess: you're going to "requisition" something from us law-abiding, hard-working folk, right?

If you ask me, it's worth some coin to get you to play soldier somewhere else.
